Button.name: autoFocus
Button.description: Whether the element should receive focus on render.

Button.name: endIcon
Button.description: Icon added after the button text.

Button.name: href
Button.description: A URL to link to if as="a".

Button.name: excludeFromTabOrder
Button.description:
Whether to exclude the element from the sequential tab order. If true,
the element will not be focusable via the keyboard by tabbing. This should
be avoided except in rare scenarios where an alternative means of accessing
the element or its functionality via the keyboard is available.

Button.name: rel
Button.description: The relationship between the linked resource and the current page. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel).

Button.name: startIcon
Button.description: Icon added before the button text.

Button.name: target
Button.description: The target window for the link.

Button.name: type
Button.description: The behavior of the button when used in an HTML form.

Button.name: variant
Button.description: The display variant of the button.

ButtonGroup.name: isDisabled
ButtonGroup.description: Whether the buttons in the button group are all disabled.

ButtonGroup.name: isAttached
ButtonGroup.description: Whether the buttons in the button are attached.

ButtonGroup.name: size
ButtonGroup.description: The size of the buttons in the group.
